channel.title: Batch Error
channel.description: When i try to open any batch file it says [code]Another Program is currently using this file.[/code] Previously this has happened and i have jsut needed to restart my computer, which i have done a few times now, i checked to see if any other of my programs is running it, but of course...they're not..help please :)

item.title: Batch Error

@x_spike_x wrote:

When i try to open any batch file it says

Another Program is currently using this file.

Previously this has happened and i have jsut needed to restart my computer, which i have done a few times now, i checked to see if any other of my programs is running it, but of course…they’re not…help please
